医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
拜登政府将禁止医疗债务计入美国人的信用评分中拜登政府周四宣布了一项保护美国人免受医疗债务影响的重大举措，概述了制定联邦规则的计划，禁止未付医疗费用影响患者的信用评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Biden-administration-to-ban-medical-debt-from-Americanse28099-credit-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Biden-administration-to-ban-medical-debt-from-Americanse28099-credit-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6a72bb2-9e6c-4013-9a24-9d8c4e6b2670 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 20:56:37 -0400 Biden administration to ban medical debt from Americans’ credit scores
TTUHSC 获得 147 万美元赠款，用于孕产妇健康研究根据《美国医学会杂志》最近发表的一项研究，从 1999 年（每 10 万名新生儿中有 10.3 人死亡）到 2019 年（每 10 万名新生儿有 21.9 人死亡），过去二十年德克萨斯州的孕产妇发病率和死亡率增加了一倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/24147-million-grant-awarded-to-TTUHSC-for-maternal-health-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/24147-million-grant-awarded-to-TTUHSC-for-maternal-health-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1f2548c-f06f-4a1f-8278-17974049193c Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:29:00 -0400 $1.47 million grant awarded to TTUHSC for maternal health research
威尔康奈尔医学院获得美国国立卫生研究院拨款领导国家避孕研究中心威尔康奈尔医学院获得了一项为期三年、近 600 万美元的资助，用于领导三个国家避孕研究中心之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-NIH-grant-to-lead-a-national-contraceptive-research-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-NIH-grant-to-lead-a-national-contraceptive-research-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df40d80b-3a9a-4325-8e04-4221c23accd9 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:25:35 -0400 Weill Cornell Medicine receives NIH grant to lead a national contraceptive research center
研究揭示婴儿颅缝早闭的原因威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员领导的一项临床前研究表明，颅缝早闭是婴儿头骨顶部过早融合的现象，是由一种先前未知类型的骨形成干细胞异常过量引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Study-sheds-light-on-the-cause-of-craniosynostosis-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Study-sheds-light-on-the-cause-of-craniosynostosis-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699fe34a-abb7-4cfd-8de2-180191d7382d Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:18:19 -0400 Study sheds light on the cause of craniosynostosis in infants
英国的新资金将有助于应对世界上最紧迫的健康挑战英国的新资金将通过促进卫生安全和改善世界各地的健康和福祉来帮助实现联合国可持续发展目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/New-UK-funding-will-help-tackle-the-worlds-most-pressing-health-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/New-UK-funding-will-help-tackle-the-worlds-most-pressing-health-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f60ceb59-c015-44f7-9366-22352ddfc62f Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:13:05 -0400 New UK funding will help tackle the world's most pressing health challenges
KFF 健康新闻“健康状况如何？”：关闭倒计时由于国会急于在 10 月 1 日开始本财年，但尚未通过 12 项年度拨款法案中的任何一项，卫生和其他联邦项目面临着关闭的风险，至少是暂时关闭的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Countdown-to-shutdown.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Countdown-to-shutdown.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a9f38a2-9a4c-4632-9602-ae144f5254c5 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:10:23 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Countdown to shutdown
研究人员开发出对抗化疗耐药小细胞肺癌的新方法小细胞肺癌约占所有诊断肺癌的 15%，并且仍然具有高死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-fighting-chemo-pressive-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-fighting-chemo-pressive-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2fc7c83-1737-4ecd-a078-d0d84214358a Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:04:31 -0400 Researchers develop new approach to fighting chemo-resistant small cell lung cancer
研究发现个人气质、体力活动和久坐行为之间存在联系在女性中，经历更多负面情绪的倾向与较低的体力活动水平有关，尤其是在闲暇时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Study-finds-links- Between-individual-temperament-physical-activity-and-sedentary-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Study-finds-links- Between-individual-temperament-physical-activity-and-sedentary-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ed0e9a0-e8fc-4444-8974-47bdb3a059d1 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 14:57:50 -0400 Study finds links between individual temperament, physical activity, and sedentary behavior
ACC Asia 2023 将汇聚专家以改善心血管护理美国心脏病学会 (ACC) 和菲律宾心脏协会将于 9 月 29 日至 30 日在菲律宾马尼拉举办 ACC Asia 2023。最新研究显示，2019年全球1860万例心脏病相关死亡中，58%发生在亚洲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/ACC-Asia-2023-to-bring-together-experts-to-improve-cardioangio-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/ACC-Asia-2023-to-bring-together-experts-to-improve-cardioangio-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32347ce5-3223-43a9-81b9-6b6b4e9641e7 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 14:34:14 -0400 ACC Asia 2023 to bring together experts to improve cardiovascular care
研究人员发现与小鼠睡眠准备行为有关的大脑通路研究人员发现了与小鼠“睡眠准备行为”有关的大脑通路，这可能也适用于人类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Researchers-discover-brain-pathways-involved-in-sleep-preparatory-behavior-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Researchers-discover-brain-pathways-involved-in-sleep-preparatory-behavior-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b54d37b1-4f98-410f-b4a1-418d7736a060 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 14:26:01 -0400 Researchers discover brain pathways involved in sleep preparatory behavior in mice
